page.title: 13Home Life In Norton Area.
page.content: {Cooking. } Most people in our area use electric stoves or solid fuel ovens. In the oven you can make casseroles, roast meat and potatoes,bake cakes,pizzas, quiches, bread, and puddings. On the hot plate of the cooker you can boil vegetables or fry chips and cook eggs. We boil in pots and pans, and fry in frying pans. Some people use a microwave oven, for which you must not use metal containers. It is much quicker than an electric oven. After cooking and eating a meal we wash up our dishes, and either dry them on a tea towel , or leave them on the draining board to drain. Some people use a dish washing machine.
